documentation.title: Member Var Spacing
documentation.standard: There should be one blank line before the first member var.

code.title: Valid: One blank line before the first member var.
Invalid: Incorrect number of blank lines before the first member var.

documentation.standard: There should be one blank line between member vars.

code.title: Valid: One blank line between each member var.
Invalid: Incorrect number of blank lines between each member var.

documentation.standard: There should be no blank line between a member var's comment and the member var.

code.title: Valid: No blank lines between comment and member var.
Invalid: Blank line(s) between comment and member var.
